description.@en: Once they profess their might, a Sirocco Prophet’s body grows gravid with black, stone-like growths and their voice becomes but a harsh whisper – the sound of tectonic plates slowly moving beneath the earth.

effect.@en: You do not need to be able to speak to cast Magick, use Rituals or Counterspell. In addition, you automatically Resist touch-based spells.
